metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44420 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Django 2.2 before 2.2.25, 3.1 before 3.1.14, and 3.2 before 3.2.10, HTTP requests for URLs with trailing newlines could bypass upstream access control based on URL paths.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-44420` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.24-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> code in bionic is different, doesn't look affected

criterions.comment: python-django package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.24-1ubuntu1.1').
